channel.title: connectivity solutions on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in connectivity solutions on FinanClub

item.title: NOK
item.description: score:18 Chances: Nokia introduces 25G PON kit for high-speed connectivity. Nokia launches improved home connectivity software. Nokia expands network-in-a-box program to speed up broadband network builds. Nokia and Eastlink join forces to upgrade 5G network. Nokia expands manufacturing in the U.S. for fiber broadband optical modules.

item.title: CRDO
item.description: score:792 Chances: Announcement of Credo Technology Group Holding’s conference call to discuss financial results for the fiscal first quarter. Credo’s participation in OCP China Day to showcase its HiWire AEC technology. Discussion about share price drop and potential concerns among shareholders. Earnings and revenue surprises reported for the quarter ended April 2023.
